editor.label: Application server - IIS resumewebsite
editor.description: This procedure continues server operation after it has been paused.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself, use 'localhost'.

formElement.label: Web side id:
formElement.documentation: Provide the site identification number to attach to the site that you want to resume. The default value is 1.
